Choe Ik Gyu Meets Foreign Delegations 
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Choe Ik Gyu, chairman of the organizing committee of the 23rd April Spring Friendship Art Festival, separately met and had friendly talks with the Chinese government cultural delegation led by Shan Jixiang, director of the State Administration of Cultural Heritage, and the Cambodian cultural delegation led by In Siyonda, secretary of State of the Ministry of Culture and Arts.
 Officials concerned and the Chinese ambassador to the DPRK were on hand.

articles.content:
Cuban Diplomats Commemorate Day of Sun 
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Giraldo Abreu Morales, military attache of the Cuban embassy here, hosted a reception on Monday evening to commemorate the Day of the Sun and the 12th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defense Commission.
 Speeches were made at the reception.    
 Present on invitation were general officers and officers of the Korean People's Army. Ambassador Ruben Perez Valdes and staff members of the Cuban embassy were on hand.

articles.content:
Educational Aid Fund and Stipends to Children of Korean Residents in Japan
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il sent educational aid fund and stipends amounting to 216.76 million yen for development of the democratic national education of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
 The total amount of the educational aid fund and stipends sent by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to Chongryon for the democratic national education of the children of Koreans in Japan in 151 installments so far has reached 45,533,723,000 yen.

articles.content:
Former Indonesian President Here
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Former Indonesian President Megawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, and her party arrived here Tuesday to participate in the commemorations of the 40th anniversary of the naming of Kimilsungia, the flower of the sun, and the 7th Kimilsungia Festival.
 They were met at the airport by Kang Nung Su, chairman of the Korean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee who is vice-chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Hendrati Sukendar Munthe, Indonesian ambassadress to the DPRK, and her embassy officials.
